body.name: Creative Live! Cam Sync V3 2K QHD USB Webcam with 4X Digital Zoom (4 Zoom Modes from Wide Angle to Narrow Portrait View), Privacy Lens, 2 Mics, for PC and Mac…

features: 2K QHD WEBCAM THAT WORKS WITH ANY PLATFORMS - Capable of delivering 2K QHD resolution at 2560 x 1400 @ 30 fps*, Creative Live! Cam Sync V3 gives remarkably detailed and smooth visuals, displaying you in full clarity. It’s UVC compliant, which means it requires no additional driver installation, and is compatible with PC, Mac, and most popular conference apps like Zoom, Skype, WebEx, and Teams. *A separate third-party application is required

4X DIGITAL ZOOM, FROM CLOSE UPS TO WHITEBOARD PRESENTATIONS - Go from an optimally spaced zoom range that fits 3-4 pax in a group presentation (by default), to perfectly framed head-to-shoulder view (2X zoom) with optimal eye contact, to super zoomed close ups (4X zoom) for when you need to demonstrate a small object to others in the call. Enhance your on-screen clarity and details by accessing 2K (2560 x 1440) resolution when you are on 1X zoom via a third-party app

DUAL BUILT-IN MICS WITH SMART COMMS FEATURES - With two built-in omni-directional digital microphones, your voice gets picked up clearly and accurately, and you will come off sounding natural and realistic; almost as natural as talking face-to-face. It also comes with our SmartComms Kit, a suite of smart communication features, including NoiseClean-out that removes unwanted background noise, via the downloadable Creative app for Windows

PRIVACY-PROTECTION LENS CAP - Whether it’s an emergency or just for privacy after use, the integrated lens cover provides protection from unwanted access to your webcam via spyware, so you can feel safe about leaving your camera connected. It also prevents dust from accumulating around the lens edge, keeping it clean for crisp visual clarity

ADJUST AT WILL WITH 360° ROTATION AND 30° TILT - The webcam comes with a cable length of 1.8m (5.9 ft) and a universal mounting clip that allows it to be attached firmly on any laptop, desktop monitors, or even tripods (not included). It is also fully adjustable with 360° horizontal rotation and 30° tilt, so you can find the best angle according to your needs and look perfect all the time

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 856 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Be ready in an instant and be seen at your best in 2K QHD clarity! 2K QHD Webcam with 4X Digital Zoom and Built-in Mics Be ready in an instant and be seen at your best in full HD clarity! Creative Live! Cam Sync V3 is a plug-and-play 2K QHD webcam that delivers remarkably detailed and smooth visuals. With 4X digital zoom, you will be able to select from a variety of zoom ranges that are best cropped for your needs and environment. Show a lot of your background by choosing an optimally spaced zoom range that fits a group of 4 or capture only yourself with a perfectly-framed head-to-shoulder view for one-on-one calls. This webcam comes with dual omni-directional mics, and is ideal for any setups, be it for web conference, an online interview, or just catching up with loved ones. Simply plug it in and be ready to connect!

It's UVC compliant for plug-and-play Requiring no additional driver installation, the Creative Live! Cam Sync V3 is compatible with all PC and Macs, as well as most of the popular video apps. Just plug it into your computer and get to the call right away, even the last-minute ones.

Be seen in 2K QHD Show up in 2K QHD* resolution at 2560 x 1400 @ 30 fps that captures most of your surroundings and is ideal for online demonstrations requiring a physical whiteboard. *2K QHD output quality on Windows and Mac is available with free and open-source software such as OBS.

4X digital zoom for different zoom ranges Optimally spaced (default 1X zoom) Fits any group presentations of up to 4 pax or even an adequately spaced single-person setup so you won’t appear too close on the screen. Focused (2X zoom) The ideal head-to-shoulders view, perfect for one-on-one conversations with optimal eye contact, like an online interview, and where the focus is on you. Close up (3X zoom) Shows the best setup for intimate conversations, cropping out much of your background, so it feels like you are closer with your loved ones. Super zoom (4X zoom) Crops out most of your background, so if you need to get as close to the screen as possible, like showing a small object, three light taps will get you there.

Communications Comes with dual built-in microphones We make sure you are heard clearly. With dual omni-directional digital microphones built into the webcam, your voice gets picked up clearly and accurately, and you will sound more natural and realistic. For example, a call with gramps will sound as if you are conversing in person! Communicate smarter On the other hand, you could also skip the unnecessary microphone controls, focus on your online chats whether for work or play, and sound clear in them without the annoying background noise or being told to “please go on mute”. Our SmartComms Kit, available via the downloaded Creative app on our Worldwide Support page, features a suite of smart communication features designed to help you speak and converse with ease. VoiceDetect:Designed to intelligently pick up your voice when you speak and cuts off when you’re done, say goodbye to the days of accidental muted conversations. VoiceDetect works by voice detection and frees up your hands and mind for other important tasks.NoiseClean-out:Sometimes, we are the problem. NoiseClean-out removes unwanted background noise from YOUR side of the call so others can hear you clearly. Your background noise is suppressed, delivering only your clean voice to them on the other end.

Privacy, Angles, and Design Privacy lens cap Privacy matters, and that’s why Creative Live! Cam Sync V3 sports an integrated privacy lens cover that guards you from unwanted access to your webcam via spyware when not in use. Lift up the lens cap and cover it up for privacy (or emergency). Get your best angle Whether you are mounting the webcam on your PC or a tripod, it is fully adjustable with a 360° horizontal rotation and 30° tilt. Find the perfect angle according to your needs and look your best all the time. Controls are right there Mount the webcam firmly on any laptop or monitors with its universal mounting clip. You can also attach the webcam to any universal tripods* for more versatility. The webcam’s cable measures at 1.8m (5.9 ft), suitable for those who needs it placed at a distance.

Creative Live! Cam Sync V3 Creative Live! Cam Sync 1080p V2 Creative Live! Cam Sync 1080p Digital Zoom Range Up to 4X N/A N/A Resolution Max: QHD (1440p) @ 30 fps / FHD (1080p) @ 30 fps FHD (1080p) @ 30 fps FHD (1080p) @ 30 fps Field of View Up to 95° 77° 77° Built-in Mics ✓ ✓ ✓ Dimensions and Weight 82 x 53 x 58 mm / 3.23 x 2.09 x 2.28 inches, 95.7g (3.38 oz) 83 x 58 x 60 mm / 3.26 x 2.28 x 2.36 inches, 100g (3.52 oz) 105 x 65 x 60 mm / 4.1 x 2.6 x 2.4 inches, 96g (3.4 oz) Cable Length (end-to-end) 1.8m / 5.9 ft 1.8m / 5.9 ft 1.5m / 4.9 ft Privacy Lens Cover ✓ ✓ ✓ SmartComms Kit via Creative app for Windows only via Creative app for Windows only x Platform Compatibility Windows PC, macOS Windows PC, macOS Windows PC, macOS (No software)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well for meetings
reviews.reviewText: I use for on line meetings.I really like the zoom feature. I have multiple monitors and sit slightly back from them. This lets me zoom in on my face better. I replaced one without a zoom.Good enough picture quality.Not sure about the sound, I use a separate headset.Need to reset the zoom each time I use the camera. Not sure if this is operator error or just the way it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Mid-Priced Webcam
reviews.reviewText: Was looking for the best bang for my buck, middle of the road cost, preferably from US company, webcam for my wife's office PC. I had previously purchased a Creative "Live Cam V1" for the home PC when webcams were in short supply. Although the cost of both were similar, this webcam "Live! Cam Sync V3" is a far superior to the earlier one. Upgrades (and why I like this one) include much better light control (much less affected by backlighting), a hinged lens cover (older one was a rubber one with a tether), a touch button on the top of the webcam that toggles through 4 zoom levels. This allows it to go from fairly wide angle (think multi-person view) to basically a tight head shot. It was plug and play in Windows 10 as we didn't want the "extra" software features. Its primary use is for Zoom meetings. Very happy with the purchase. If you want really high quality/resolution you will want to ante up for a higher quality webcam, but for most home and work from home use cases, this is ideal, and highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product at a very good price
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this webcam to replace a more expensive Logitech webcam which disappointed me when using the mics. This webcam is great as advertised, provides a clear picture, great sound, and has a decent sent of features in its software app.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good camera quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: This camera has a good quality image when the lighting is decent. It does not have autofocus but if your sitting in front of a monitor this will have you in focus quite well. Got this one after returning a logitech C615 which would not focus on my face and was quite blurry always, this is sitting around 2 feet from the camera. The clarity on this is so much better.The colors are a bit more muted compared with the logitech but if needed you could use OBS or something and make it pop. The logitech also corrects for more variations of lighting in the image compared to this one. But overall logitech is too soft and blurry so it was bad for me.The image does show a lot more noise when its dark compared with the logitech which just smoothes everything out.Overall if you use it in decent lighting for meetings its quite good and beats the logitech hands down. Just needs a bit more tweaking if you plan to use it in challenging lighting cause the auto lighting on the camera is not as good as logitechs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Better for thicker monitors
reviews.reviewText: Pros:The camera swivels (main reason I purchased this).It has a privacy cover that is attached.It adjusts the amount of background visible.Cord is a long enough to accommodate if your video isn’t near the computer or docking station.The front lip of the camera is small enough so it doesn’t get in the way of the window tabs on the screen,Great price point.ConsThe clip holder works best on monitors that have at least 1 to 1.5 inches in depth. It is very challenging to get it tight on thinner monitors. And because the 4 views of the camera are adjusted by touch, when you have to try to tighten it then the file changes. When you turn the camera sideways, then it loosens the holder and changes the field view. So it’s a vicious cycle and takes a while to get it adjusted. Because I bring it back and forth from work and work from home days, this is a cycle that I don’t wish to go through, so it will be returned. If you can set it and leave it, it should be ok. The picture is fine, but didn’t see much difference between it and my old Logitech 615. I haven’t tried to use the microphone in it, because I use headphones for my microphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have the clearest video of anyone at work
reviews.reviewText: Crystal clear video even in dim lighting. I use an external mic for audio, but the mic on this works really well too. I got it for meetings and streaming.Easy to mount on my monitor with the clip/folding leg apparatus on all webcams or by screwing the base onto a tripod mount.Definitely would recommend. The touch to zoom feature it SO nice too. Just tap on the top of the camera housing to cycle through the different magnification settings (I think its actually just changing your Field of View, at least for the first two, so you don't lose video quality).You also don't have to search for software to download to get it up and running. I seem to remember it being plug and play with an option to download software that helps you adjust video setting, brightness, etc. if you're into that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars ok for the price, has electrnic zoom
reviews.reviewText: from all the countless cameras out there this is probably one of the more usable ones. More usable because it has a zoom and the picture quality is good. Nothing excellent or anywhere near the camera quality of your cell phone but clean enough for most uses like zoom meetings. Most webcams look awefull because they have microscopic sensor paired with bad lenses. This results is grainy, distorted and blurry picture quality. This webcam is not much better but probably better that the camera already in your laptop and you can change the zoom angle which is a big practical advantage over a fixed wide angle. The more you zoom in the more you lose in resolution because its not a lens (optical) zoom but an image crop. Better than nothing.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use, plug and play!
reviews.reviewText: Good value, but easy to use overall!

I bought this camera mainly to use on my old 2012 mac mini that i got from a value village and keep in my room instead of the logitech e920c that i have on my main pc. The picture quality is OUSTANDING! but alas, the software isnt available for mac. I swapped the two and my friends love the picture quality. I already have a dedicated microphone but when I tested the built in one, it sounds just as good. I would definitely recommend this one for anyone looking for a decent webcam to use at around $50 CAD (as of time of writing).
Es lo que ocupaba nada top por el precio me fue muy bien
Excelente producto. Buena calidad de imagen y del micrófono sobre todo. Creo que es mejor, comparada con cámaras similares de otras marcas.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very Good Quality For The Price
reviews.reviewText: It is a super compact little thing. Puts out great quality with proper lighting. Outside use with a laptop shows excellent results. Low light indoors it looks like the typical webcam.*** It is not ideal for LiveStreaming at a high quality. It has a small lag.That said, it is a very great quality and size for the price.
